version_description:

- Now you can open profile in online with one tap on user photo
- Some bug fixes

We’ve added awesome Ginger stickers for iMessage, available for downloading on iOS 10
We’ve also fixed issues with photos upload from the library on iOS 10
Soon we shall release a brand-new and redesigned iOS version. Stay tuned.

We’ve added awesome Ginger stickers for iMessage, available for downloading on iOS 10
We’ve also fixed issues with photos upload from the library on iOS 10
Soon we shall release a brand-new and redesigned iOS version. Stay tuned.

We promised to show you a brand-new and redesigned iOS version, and we're very-very close to the final release, believe us.
This time, we are ready with small fixes, that may be critical to you:
• We've added new push notifications controls, which can be found in the Settings section of the Menu;
• We've also fixed an issue with a profile log-out;
• In case you broke Hitwe's terms of use, you'll see an appropriate warning message.
Stay tuned.

We promised to show you a brand-new and redesigned iOS version, and we're very-very close to the final release, believe us.
This time, we are ready with small fixes, that may be critical to you:
• We've added new push notifications controls, which can be found in the Settings section of the Menu;
• We've also fixed an issue with a profile log-out;
• In case you broke Hitwe's terms of use, you'll see an appropriate warning message.
Stay tuned.

We are happy to introduce you the brand new and redesigned version of our Hitwe app.
We kindly ask you to uninstall the previous version and install the new one.
• This time we are bringing you a great usability, along with an intuitive design and simplicity.
• We've critically rethought the way you navigate the app and created tabs instead of old-fashioned burger menu.
• Online section is now replaced with the "Feed" tab, where you can easily browse people from your region.
• Contacts section will let you keep your most important people in one place.
• Hope you'll like our new profile page that let you quickly browse photos.
• Every 1-2 week we shall regularly update and improve our app.
Thanks for using our app, hope you'll enjoy it.

We are happy to introduce you the brand new and redesigned version of our Hitwe app.
We kindly ask you to uninstall the previous version and install the new one.
• This time we are bringing you a great usability, along with an intuitive design and simplicity.
• We've critically rethought the way you navigate the app and created tabs instead of old-fashioned burger menu.
• Online section is now replaced with the "Feed" tab, where you can easily browse people from your region.
• Contacts section will let you keep your most important people in one place.
• Hope you'll like our new profile page that let you quickly browse photos.
• Every 1-2 week we shall regularly update and improve our app.
Thanks for using our app, hope you'll enjoy it.

In order to change your pass, please use the link below:
https://hitwe.com/changepass
This is a critical update of today's new app version.
We are very sorry for the inconveniences you might have with the latest version of the app.
Our desire to present you a brand new Hitwe app in the shortest length of time turned into a lack of testing.
We promise to test every single update really thoroughly in the future to let you have the best possible experience.
Thanks for using our app, hope you'll enjoy it. Please accept our apologies.

We've made minor improvements and bug fixes in this update.
Push notifications now lead to a specific screen of the app or to a message directly.
Mutual likes list have been also added.
A lot of issues on iPhone 4s have been fixed. Now the app should run smoothly on these devices.
We'll release some additional features next week. Stay tuned.

We've made minor improvements and bug fixes in this update.
Push notifications now lead to a specific screen of the app or to a message directly.
Mutual likes list have been also added.
A lot of issues on iPhone 4s have been fixed. Now the app should run smoothly on these devices.
We'll release some additional features next week. Stay tuned.

In this version of the app we've added:
- ability to recover your password;
- brand new registration form.
- feedback screen in Me tab, we'd be glad to hear any suggestions for improvements
We've also fixed:
- push notifications now lead to a specific screen even if the app is closed;
- immediate reaction to a photo deletion;
- uploading photos to gallery, instead of the main picture;
- minor crashes and bugs;
- close button of the ad.

In this version of the app we've added:
- ability to recover your password;
- brand new registration form.
- feedback screen in Me tab, we'd be glad to hear any suggestions for improvements
We've also fixed:
- push notifications now lead to a specific screen even if the app is closed;
- immediate reaction to a photo deletion;
- uploading photos to gallery, instead of the main picture;
- minor crashes and bugs;
- close button of the ad.

- You can now send a "greeting sticker", when starting a new conversation.
- New likes push notifications now lead correctly to Activities section.
- We've added a spinner, while you are waiting for your photos to be added to an album.
- We've added an ability to quickly go to app settings in case you accidentally denied location permission.
- Don't forget to leave a feedback, that will really help us make our app even better in the future.
Thanks for using Hitwe.

- You can now send a "greeting sticker", when starting a new conversation.
- New likes push notifications now lead correctly to Activities section.
- We've added a spinner, while you are waiting for your photos to be added to an album.
- We've added an ability to quickly go to app settings in case you accidentally denied location permission.
- Don't forget to leave a feedback, that will really help us make our app even better in the future.
Thanks for using Hitwe.

◉ We've improved overall performance and stability of the app
◉ The Feed section has been redesigned
◉ We've added a blacklist containing users you've blocked
◉ We've also added Hot users list in 'Me' section
◉ Filters in Rate section now works smoothly and have a nice graphic improvement.
◉ We've finally added a premium membership, letting you have an access to our premium features.
Thanks for using our app.

- improved performance and stability;
- fixed issue with crashes on iOS 9.

- improved performance and stability;

People are usually 3 times more active in the app during Valentine's day, don't waste your chance to meet someone special.
Main improvements of this version:
– improved stability and performance of the app;
– now you can set incoming messages filters in the Chat tab, including gender, age, country, photos;
– you can specify the category of report and provide us with some additional details.
– reminder to upload your photo should work smoothly in this version.
Thanks for using our hitwe app!

- We've also added a notification if there are some connection problems.
- Photo upload now should work smoothly on all devices.

- fixed the issue with photo upload
- fixed the issue with premium screen error on some countries.
If you have any issue, don't hesitate to contact our support@hitwe.com

We are happy to introduce pets!
They've already been introduced on Android, now finally coming to iOS.
With pets you can customize your hitwe experience and get additional features in the future.
We'll be glad to hear your feedback
